name: Speed Swap
effect: Never Fail. Swap the User's Base Dexterity with the target. If this would lower the Foe's Base Stats by greater than three, it only lower the Stats by three. If this would raise the User's Base stats by greater than three, it only raises them by three. Swap the User's Dexterity Stat Changes with the Foe.
description: The Pokemon employs its psychic power to make the opponent perceive events as if they were happening faster or slower according to the user's own speed.
